00117 hash_table_t * cache_inode_init( cache_inode_parameter_t param, cache_inode_status_t *pstatus )
00118 {
00119   hash_table_t * ht = NULL ;
00120 
00121   ht = HashTable_Init( param.hparam ) ;
00122 
00123   if( ht != NULL )
00124     *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00125   else
00126     *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00127 
00128   DisplayLog( "Using write-through metadata cache" ) ;
00129  
00130   return ht ;
00131 } /* cache_inode_init */

00147 int cache_inode_client_init( cache_inode_client_t * pclient, 
00148                              cache_inode_client_parameter_t param, 
00149                              int thread_index, 
00150                              void * pworker_data )
00151 {
00152   LRU_status_t lru_status ;
00153 
00154   pclient->log_outputs              = param.log_outputs ;
00155   pclient->attrmask                 = param.attrmask ;
00156   pclient->nb_prealloc              = param.nb_prealloc_entry ;
00157   pclient->nb_pre_dir_data          = param.nb_pre_dir_data ;
00158   pclient->nb_pre_parent            = param.nb_pre_parent ;
00159   pclient->nb_pre_state_v4          = param.nb_pre_state_v4 ;
00160   pclient->grace_period_attr        = param.grace_period_attr ;
00161   pclient->grace_period_link        = param.grace_period_link ;
00162   pclient->grace_period_dirent      = param.grace_period_dirent ;
00163   pclient->use_test_access          = param.use_test_access ;
00164   pclient->getattr_dir_invalidation = param.getattr_dir_invalidation ; 
00165   pclient->call_since_last_gc       = 0 ;
00166   pclient->time_of_last_gc          = time( NULL ) + thread_index * 20  ; /* All the thread will not gc at the same time */
00167   pclient->pworker                  = pworker_data ;
00168   pclient->use_cache                = param.use_cache ;
00169   pclient->retention                = param.retention ;
00170   pclient->max_fd_per_thread        = param.max_fd_per_thread ;
00171   
00172 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00173   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00174   BuddySetDebugLabel( "cache_entry_t" ) ;
00175 #endif
00176 
00177 #ifndef _NO_BLOCK_PREALLOC
00178   STUFF_PREALLOC( pclient->pool_entry, 
00179                   pclient->nb_prealloc, 
00180                   cache_entry_t, 
00181                   next_alloc ) ;
00182   if( pclient->pool_entry == NULL )
00183     {
00184       DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs, "Error : can't init cache_inode client entry pool" ) ;
00185       return 1 ;
00186     }
00187 #endif
00188   
00189 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00190   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00191   BuddySetDebugLabel( "cache_inode_dir_data_t" ) ;
00192 #endif
00193 
00194 #ifndef _NO_BLOCK_PREALLOC
00195   STUFF_PREALLOC( pclient->pool_dir_data, 
00196                   pclient->nb_pre_dir_data, 
00197                   cache_inode_dir_data_t, 
00198                   next_alloc ) ;
00199   if( pclient->pool_dir_data == NULL )
00200     { 
00201       DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs, "Error : can't init cache_inode client dir data pool" ) ;
00202       return 1 ;
00203     }
00204 #endif
00205       
00206 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00207   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00208   BuddySetDebugLabel( "cache_inode_parent_entry_t" ) ;
00209 #endif
00210 
00211 #ifndef _NO_BLOCK_PREALLOC
00212   STUFF_PREALLOC( pclient->pool_parent,
00213                   pclient->nb_pre_parent,
00214                   cache_inode_parent_entry_t, 
00215                   next_alloc ) ;
00216   if( pclient->pool_parent == NULL )
00217     { 
00218       DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs, "Error : can't init cache_inode client parent link pool" ) ;
00219       return 1 ;
00220     }
00221 #endif
00222  
00223 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00224   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00225   BuddySetDebugLabel( "cache_inode_state_v4_t" ) ;
00226 #endif
00227  
00228 #ifndef _NO_BLOCK_PREALLOC
00229   STUFF_PREALLOC( pclient->pool_state_v4,
00230                   pclient->nb_pre_state_v4,
00231                   cache_inode_state_v4_t,
00232                   next ) ;
00233   if( pclient->pool_state_v4 == NULL )
00234     {
00235       DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs, "Error : can't init cache_inode client state v4 pool" ) ;
00236       return 1 ;
00237     }
00238 #endif
00239 
00240   
00241 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00242   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00243   BuddySetDebugLabel( "cache_inode_fsal_data_t:init" ) ;
00244 #endif
00245 
00246 #ifndef _NO_BLOCK_PREALLOC
00247   STUFF_PREALLOC( pclient->pool_key, 
00248                   pclient->nb_prealloc, 
00249                   cache_inode_fsal_data_t, 
00250                   next_alloc ) ;
00251   
00252 # ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00253     /* For debugging memory leaks */
00254     BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00255 # endif
00256 
00257   if( pclient->pool_key == NULL )
00258     {
00259       DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs, "Error : can't init cache_inode client key pool" ) ;
00260       return 1 ;
00261     }
00262 #endif  
00263 
00264   if( ( pclient->lru_gc = LRU_Init( param.lru_param, &lru_status ) ) == NULL )
00265     {
00266       DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs, "Error : can't init cache_inode client lru gc" ) ;
00267       return 1  ;
00268     }
00269 
00270   /* Everything was ok, return 0 */
00271   return 0 ;
00272 } /* cache_inode_client_init */
